title: DR. CHRIS' NATURAL REMEDIES
author: Ourtown
cleaned_text: DR. CHRIS' NATURAL REMEDIES RE: Free Chiropractic for Kids The chiropractors at Dr. Chris' Natural Remedies in Snellville, GA are offering anyone under 18 years of age free chiropractic care during the Gwinnett County School Closures. Visits are on a walk-in basis only. This extends to anyone under 18, guardian must be present. Offer ends when school is back in. Sincerely, Dr. Kerith Powell Chiropractor Kerith Powell DC If the contents of this email contains personal health information, it is intended for the exclusive use of the addressee and is HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL. It is to be used only as an aid to provide specific services to this individual. Any other use is a violation of Federal Law (HIPAA) and will be reported as such. If you received this email in error, please notify the sender and delete this email. Thank you.
